name: A Fishing Game with a Twist
name_original: A Fishing Game with a Twist
description:
Fishing Game with a Twist

A Fishing Game with a Twist is a fishing game with a twist.

Go fish and maybe you will catch a big fish.

4 FISHES!

Controls

or or : pass screen, catch fish.

How to play?

Disclosure: I'm not aware of the fishing related vocabulary so I will describe the game with my own words.

You are a fisher man. It's not your job, you're more of a hobbyist or something idk.

Press (or , or , it's the same, there is only one button in this game, 3h = 1 button sry) to pull the fishing cane away from the lake. You need to do that when the fly at the end of the line disappear into the water of the lake to catch a random fish. You can press when the fly is still visible but you will not catch fish like that, but it plays a cool animation that I made so feel free to do that.

The goal is to catch a big fish.

Spoilers

Q&A: Wtf is this ending???

It came from an idea I had with friends when I was drunk in a pub. I'm sorry if you like Tim Burton.
